name: @bidnessforb/postman-sdk
description: Barebones SDK for the Postman API
author: Bryan Cross

scripts.docs:build: documentation build src/collections/index.js src/requests/index.js src/responses/index.js src/workspaces/index.js src/specs/index.js src/environments/index.js src/tags/index.js src/users/index.js src/mocks/index.js -f html -o docs/api
scripts.docs:md: documentation build src/collections/index.js src/requests/index.js src/responses/index.js src/workspaces/index.js src/specs/index.js src/environments/index.js src/tags/index.js src/users/index.js src/mocks/index.js -f md -o docs/API-REFERENCE.md && node scripts/format-api-docs.js
scripts.docs:serve: documentation serve src/collections/index.js src/requests/index.js src/responses/index.js src/workspaces/index.js src/specs/index.js src/environments/index.js src/tags/index.js src/users/index.js src/mocks/index.js -w
